name: Hunt Down The Peeman
description:
You've been called out to investigate lights in the sky. Turns out this time it wasn't a joke. Fight for mankind to stop these vile creatures from taking over our planet and eating off brand peanut butter candy pieces.

This game is short, simple and to the point. It was a big learning experience for me.

I apologize if it performs terribly, I did not spend time on compatibility.

All and any criticism encouraged and welcomed!
